comment: The main body of vertical Chinese text within a black border, containing scholarly commentary or notes. The text is arranged in columns from right to left, typical of traditional Chinese printing. It discusses revisions to a classical text (possibly 'Shuowen Jiezi'), referencing corrections made by '段先生' (Mr. Duan), and mentions specific sections like '詣部', '水部', '羊部', etc., as well as dates such as '嘉慶庚申五月'. The author's name '陳順' appears at the bottom left.
